org.raistlic.common.permutation

Class Permutation<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.permutation.Permutation<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<E>>

    public class Permutation<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<E>>
    Utility class for easy query of all possible permutations from a collection. It basically provides the following functionality: - enquiry the number of permutation count : p(m, n) - given an ordinal number i, fetch the i-th permutation result as a read-only list. - convenient for-each iteration of all the permutations It is NOT thread safe. It re-uses one array to fetch each enquiry, so if the user want to keep the i-th permutation result, make a copy.

      static interface  Permutation.Algorithm
      A callback interface that implements the permutation algorithm.
